title: President/Co-Founder
description: Luke is a senior at Harvard College studying Applied Mathematics with a focus in Computer Science. He enlisted in the Army in the fall of 2012 and served as a logistician until the summer of 2016 before matriculating at Harvard. Luke has one combat deployment to Afghanistan and spent the majority of his service stationed in Ft. Benning, GA, serving in the 75th Ranger Regimentâ€™s Regimental Special Troops Battalion (RSTB). Luke is engaged in building the veteran community at Harvard and is the president and co- founder of the Harvard Undergraduate Veterans Organization (HUVO). They have found leadership and a tremendous support network in HVO and HVAO and will continue to work to promote veteran affairs for undergraduates for the rest of their time in school. Beyond Harvard, Luke is interested in clean energy, new technology, and understanding the business applications of his academic coursework.
